    • Method Detail

      • every_nth_pair

        public static double[][] every_nth_pair(double[][] original,
                        int n)
        Reduces the size of an array of 2-arrays of doubles so that only every nth pair remains. In practice, this can be used to remove vertices of a geo-coded polygon to reduce GET request string length (used with the Police Data API).
        Parameters:
        original - The array to be simplified
        n - number of elements to skip (hence "every nth pair")
        Returns:
        A simplified array of 2-arrays of doubles.

      • mostCommon

        public static <T> T mostCommon(java.util.List<T> list)
        Get the most common element in the given list
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of elements in the list
        Parameters:
        list - The list to search
        Returns:
        The most common element in the list

      • remapDateRanges

        public static  remapDateRanges(DateRange... dateRanges)
        Needed for GraphActivity -- unpacks the dateRanges array and maps the date ranges to their textual representation.
        Parameters:
        dateRanges - the date ranges to unpack
        Returns:
        date ranges mapped to their text representations
